error.message: Class Drupal\Tests\listjs\FunctionalJavascript\ListjsMultiWidgetTest extends deprecated class Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\JavascriptTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\NodeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\listjs\FunctionalJavascript\ListjsMultiWidgetTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\NodeCreationTrait instead.
Call to method setUp() of deprecated class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead

Class Drupal\Tests\listjs\FunctionalJavascript\ListjsThemeTest extends deprecated class Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\JavascriptTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead

Class Drupal\Tests\listjs\FunctionalJavascript\ListjsViewsTest extends deprecated class Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\JavascriptTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\NodeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\listjs\FunctionalJavascript\ListjsViewsTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\NodeCreationTrait instead.
Call to method setUp() of deprecated class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to listjs.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.

The drupal/core requirement is not Drupal 9 compatible. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement compatible with Drupal 9.
